---
--- Generated by wuhaijun
--- File name : behavior_unit_destroy.lua.txt
--- DateTime : 2021/10/11
--- Description : 行为目标销毁
---

---@type battle_helper
local helper = battle_helper

---@type battle_components
local battle_components = require(helper.path.battle_components)
---@type base_behavior
local super = require(helper.path.battle_skill .. 'behavior/base_behavior')

---@class behavior_unit_destroy : base_behavior
local behavior_unit_destroy = class("behavior_unit_destroy", super)

---构造函数
---@protected
function behavior_unit_destroy:ctor()
    super.ctor(self, self.cname)
end

---行为开始，根据配置延迟后开始
---@protected
function behavior_unit_destroy:on_start()
    local entity = self:get_current_entity()
    entity:add_component(battle_components.destroyed)
end

return behavior_unit_destroy
